$description: CCUI 3.0 Brand Identity Tokens. Colors sourced from the official ClearCo 3.0 Brand Style Guidelines.

brand.$description: Core brand identity colors for CCUI 3.0. Earth-tone palette with Copper as the signature accent.

primary.$description: Primary brand color. Copper — signature accent for hero visuals and brand moments.

secondary.$description: Secondary brand color. Cast Iron — primary dark neutral for text and contrast.

tertiary.$description: Tertiary brand color. Verdigris — nature-inspired supporting color.

accent.$description: Accent color. Alloy — warm highlight, lighter companion to Copper.

onPrimary.$description: Text/foreground on primary (Copper) background. Cast Iron for WCAG AAA contrast.

onSecondary.$description: Text/foreground on secondary (Cast Iron) background. White for WCAG AAA contrast.

onTertiary.$description: Text/foreground on tertiary (Verdigris) background. Cast Iron for WCAG AAA contrast.

onAccent.$description: Text/foreground on accent (Alloy) background. Cast Iron for WCAG AAA contrast.
